name: cell-battery
effect:
Held
:   When the holder takes electric-type damage from a move, its Attack rises by one stage and this item is consumed.
short_effect: Held: Raises the holder's Attack by one stage when it takes Electric-type damage.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A consumable battery. If the
holder is hit by an Electric-type
move, its Attack will rise.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
A consumable battery. If the
holder is hit by an Electric-type
move, its Attack will rise.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts Attack if hit with an Electric-
type attack. It can only be used once.
